html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-06032017-06-02,  ,  ,  ,  TBS,  OAG,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of Auditors to the wholly-owned subsidiaries of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board
PrecisOrder Appointing 1) KPMG AS, of Stavanger, Norway, as AUDITOR of Infragas Norge AS pour l’exercice se terminant le 31 décembre 2016; 2) ERNST & YOUNG AUDIT S.A.S., of Bogotá, Colombia, as AUDITOR of PSPIB Colcondor S.A.S., PSPIB Losandes S.A.S. and PSPIB Viviendas SAS for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2016; 3) KPMG, of Sydney, Australia, as AUDITOR of Fitzroy Land Investment Company Pty Ltd for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2016; 4) ERNST & YOUNG of Christchurch, New Zealand, as AUDITOR of Global Herd NZ Limited for the fiscal year ending on May 31, 2017; 5) DELOITTE S.R.L., of Montréal, Quebec, as AUDITOR of PSPIB-RE Summit Inc., PSP Investments Holding Europe Ltd and PSP Investments Asia Limited for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2017; 6) DELOITTE & TOUCHE GMBH WIRTSCHAFTSPRÜFUNGSGESELLSCHAFT, of Düsseldorf, Germany, as AUDITOR of World Airport Partners Management GmbH and d’AviAlliance GmbH for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2016; 7) DELOITTE, S.R.L., of Toronto, Ontario, as AUDITOR of Revera Inc. for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2016; 8) DELOITTE BRAZIL, of São Paulo, Brazil, as AUDITOR of SAB Platform (Buffalo do Brasil, Empreendimentos Imobiliarios Ltda, Buffalo 2 do Brasil Empreendimentos Imobilarios Ltda.) for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2016; 9) PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS, of Auckland, New Zealand, as AUDITOR of PSPIB Waiheke Inc. for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2016; 10) PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS AUDITORE S.L., of Madrid, Spain, as AUDITOR of Roadis Transportation B.V. for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2016; 11) PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS, S.C., of Bosque, Mexico, as AUDITOR of Promotora Tursitica Rojomar, S. de R.L. de C.V. for the fiscal year ending on December 31, 2016.
AttachmentsAttachment
